item.title: Download Controller Service
item.description: Download Controller Service # ghga-de/download-controller-service ghga/download-controller-service Summary # Provided # REST API # This service provides a REST API with the following endpoints: Method Path Consumers GET /objects/{object_id} Events # This service publishes the following event types through a message broker: Topic Type Consumers file_downloads download_served file_downloads file_registered file_downloads unstaged_download_requested Consumed # REST API # This service relies on the following REST endpoints:

item.title: Upload Controller Service
